attributes.title: When You Are Pure Life-Power, You Are Paramashiva!
attributes.description:
27 FEBRUARY 2020 (8 AM IST, THURSDAY)

*POWERFULNESS, STRENGTH OF YOUR CORE EXISTENCE, IS YOUR STRENGTH. ANYTHING ELSE YOU FEEL AS YOUR STRENGTH OR AS THE SOURCE OR RESOURCE FOR YOU, IS DELUSION. ONLY IF LIFE AFFIRMING, PRO-LIFE, SWEET, CUTE, BEAUTIFUL, LOVING ATTITUDES AND APTITUDES ARE IN YOU, THEY INFUSE ENERGY IN YOU, A LIFE FORCE IN YOU.

*YOU ARE A GOD AND THAT STRENGTH IS THE PERMANENT AND ETERNAL STRENGTH AND THAT IS INVINCIBILITY. DEMONIC STRENGTHS NOT ONLY RAISES YOUR TEMPERATURE, THEY ARE TEMPORARY AND THEY DON'T SUPPORT YOUR CONSCIOUSNESS.

*MOST OF THE TIME, HUMAN BEINGS FIND VIOLENCE, ABUSIVE DEMONIC NATURE, VERY CHARGING AND SPICY. BUT NEITHER THEY ARE ETERNAL NOR PERMANENT. THOSE LIFE-NEGATIVE THOUGHT CURRENTS, COGNITIONS AND CHARGED FEELING, AND VIOLENCE-BASED ATTITUDE MAY FEEL EXCITING, BUT THE DEMONIC ENERGIES ARE NOT SUPPORTED BY THE COSMOS EVEN IF IT LOOKS VOLUMINOUS AND SUPPORTED BY A LARGE NUMBER OF PEOPLE.

*KILLING ANOTHER LIFE FOR THE SAKE OF YOUR FOOD, SURVIVAL OR FOR YOUR EXISTENCE, OR SOMETIMES TO ESTABLISH YOUR EGO USING THE NAME OF NATION OR RELIGION, AND TRYING TO ELIMINATE ANOTHER LIFE IS NOT SUPPORTED BY THE COSMOS. COSMOS IS INTENSELY FOR LIFE TO FLOURISH AND FOR POSSIBILITIES AND POWERS OF LIFE TO HAPPEN.

*THE SPACE OF KALABHAIRAVA IS PURE LIFE - PARAMASHIVA. INTERNALISE THIS ONE TRUTH, YOU WILL UNDERSTAND WHAT ALL YOU SHOULD SUPPORT IN YOUR PERSONAL LIFE AND SOCIETY AND WHAT FOR YOU SHOULD SPEND YOUR LIFE, ENERGY AND CONSCIOUSNESS. NEVER EVER SUPPORT ANY FORM OF VIOLENCE USING MAN-MADE CONSTITUTION-BASED IDEAS OF NATION, RELIGION, OR SOCIAL EXISTENCE.

*LIFE-POSITIVENESS IS LIKE A STRONG NUCLEAR FORCE IN YOU. DON’T FEEL ‘MASS IS RIGHT’, THAT A LARGE NUMBER OF PEOPLE ARE ALWAYS RIGHT, NO! KALI YUGA - ‘IRON AGE’ MEANS IRONICALLY, THE LARGE NUMBER OF PEOPLE ARE WRONG!

*FOR EXAMPLE, YOU ARE BRAINWASHED THAT KILLING ANIMALS FOR OUR FOOD IS RIGHT. NO!

*LIFE IS PURE POSITIVE EXISTENCE. WHEN YOU ARE PURE ‘LIFE-POSITIVE’, YOU ARE A LEADER. WHEN YOU ARE PURE ‘LIFE-POSSIBILITY’, YOU ARE DEVA, GOD. WHEN YOU ARE PURE ‘LIFE-POWER’, YOU ARE MAHADEVA - PARAMASHIVA!

*I AM NOT TEACHING WEAKNESS, POWERLESSNESS. O HINDUS! LISTEN TO ME, I AM MAKING YOU A REAL ARJUNA. WHAT KRISHNA TAUGHT, THAT SECRET I AM TEACHING.

*YOU HAVE STARTED BEHAVING AS PER REACTIONARY ASSUMPTIONS. YOU STARTED LOSING THE ELITE CULTURE REVEALED TO US BY OUR ANCESTORS AFTER 1000S OF YEARS OF RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT. LOSING THE VEGETARIAN FOOD AND CULTURE AND JUSTIFYING THAT IN VEDIC TIMES PEOPLE USED TO HAVE NON-VEGETARIAN FOOD, IS THE WORST STUPIDITY.

*LIKE THE OUTER WORLD MODERN DAY TECHNOLOGY, OUR LIFE STYLE AND THOUGHT CURRENT IS THE TECHNOLOGY REVEALED BY THE RISHIS IN THE INNER WORLD.

*PURELY IRONED OUT, NONVIOLENCE, NON-STEALING, MINIMALISTIC, INTEGRATED, PURE LIFE TAUGHT BY KRISHNA TO ARJUNA AND UPANISHADIC RISHIS TO US IS AN EXTREMELY STRENGTHENING, POWERFUL TECHNOLOGY.

*YOU BECOME HINDU WHEN YOU DISCOVER THE COSMIC POWERFUL COGNITIONS OF UPANISHAD, BRAHMA SUTRA, BHAGAVAD GITA AND VEDA AGAMA, NOT JUST BECAUSE WHO YOUR FATHER AND MOTHER IS.

*PURE LOVE, TYAGA, NONVIOLENCE, WILL LOOK AS IF THEY ARE WEAKENING, THEY WILL SEEM LIKE A LOSER’S THOUGHT CURRENT. NO! IF YOU WITHDRAW, AND DON’T FIGHT DUE TO WRONG COGNITIONS, YOU WILL BECOME WEAK, BECAUSE THE WITHDRAWAL IS DUE TO FEAR OF THE CONSEQUENCES, AND YOU STOP ACTING, MAKING DECISIONS, MAKING PROGRESS. THEN YOU ARE WEAK, YOU ARE A CHANDALA. IF YOU ACT BASED ON REACTIONARY ASSUMPTIONS, VIOLENCE, YOU ARE A SHUDRA, PANCHAMA.

*IF YOUR CORE BELIEF IS EXTREME LOVE, TYAGA, CONSCIOUSNESS AND POWERFULNESS, IT MANIFESTS AS A POWER BEYOND YOUR BODY.

*I AM TRYING TO CONVEY THIS MULTIDIMENSIONAL LOGIC AND TRUTHS IN BINARY LANGUAGE TO THE PEOPLE WHO ARE STUCK IN BINARY LANGUAGE. YOU ARE NOT ONLY STUCK IN BINARY LOGIC, YOU ARE STUPIDLY HABITUATED TO BINARY LOGIC’S LANGUAGE THAT FOR EVEN THE WORDS I AM UTTERING, YOU MAKE YOUR OWN MEANING!

*YESTERDAY WHEN I SAW THE COMMENTS OF PEOPLE AFTER SATSANG, I UNDERSTOOD THAT PEOPLE DON'T ABSOLUTELY UNDERSTAND WHAT I AM TALKING.
